name: Hatchimals Nightmares
description:
Hatchimals Nightmares Shirt out now! buy it Here!

Hatchimals Nightmares is a game about surviving nights and trying to find the hatchimal's secret. your character "Denis" got 3 Draggles for his birthday. But he is creeped out with them now. so he plays with his other ones more. the Draggles have been watching you. Now they want revenge. BEWARE. The hatchimals are friendly and cute at day, but at NIGHT. beware... Controls: arrow keys to switch rooms. Spacebar to start game and flashlight.
